isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 35
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the cab door trim panel (Item 1) being held away from the cab door (Item 2), connect electrical connectors (Item 3) onto electric window and door lock switch (Item 4). If so equipped, connect electrical connector (Item 5) onto electric mirror switch, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 34
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 33
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once cab door trim panel (Item 3) is positioned properly at the cab door (Item 11) align the push-in fasteners on the back of cab door trim panel with the holes in the cab door. Carefully push the push-in fasteners into the cab door.
Install grab handle (Item 10) and install two torx pan head bolts (Item 9) securing it to cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown.
Position map pocket trim panel (Item 5) at cab door trim panel (Item 3) connect wiring harness connector (Item 7) to cab door Speaker (Item 8), driver side shown.
Align push-in fasteners on the back of map pocket trim panel (Item 5) with holes cab door trim panel (Item 3). Carefully push the push-in fasteners into the cab door trim panel, driver side shown.

Position courtesy light (Item 4) at map pocket trim panel (Item 5) connect wiring harness connector (Item 6) to courtesy light and carefully push into map pocket trim panel opening, driver side shown.
Install inner door pull cup (Item 2) into the cab door trim panel (Item 3). Install two torx pan head screws (Item 1), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door trim panel with electric door window and locks.

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 34
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 36
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once cab door trim panel (Item 3) is positioned properly at the cab door (Item 11) align the push-in fasteners on the back of cab door trim panel with the holes in the cab door. Carefully push the push-in fasteners into the cab door.
Install grab handle (Item 10) and install two torx pan head bolts (Item 9) securing it to cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown.
Position map pocket trim panel (Item 5) at cab door trim panel (Item 3) connect wiring harness connector (Item 7) to cab door Speaker (Item 8), driver side shown.
Align push-in fasteners on the back of map pocket trim panel (Item 5) with holes cab door trim panel (Item 3). Carefully push the push-in fasteners into the cab door trim panel, driver side shown.

Position courtesy light (Item 4) at map pocket trim panel (Item 5) connect wiring harness connector (Item 6) to courtesy light and carefully push into map pocket trim panel opening, driver side shown.
Install inner door pull cup (Item 2) into the cab door trim panel (Item 3). Install two torx pan head screws (Item 1), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

Install retaining clip (Item 12) onto window regulator handle (Item 13), then install window regulator handle onto window regulator handle shaft (Item 11) until retaining clip locks into groove in the window regulator handle shaft, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door trim panel with manual door window and locks.
